title: EP 147: Return of The Mack w/ Roadie Mack
itunes:title: EP 147: Return of The Mack w/ Roadie Mack
description:
We sit down w/ possibly one of our most polarizing guest ever, gentleman of leisure "Roadie Mack". "Roadie" give's us a sneak peak into the world of "The Game", We discuss how he has traveled the world with his "partners", how he has survived his occupation for 30 years, the economics of macking, the dangers of pimping vs macking and how he lost several friends in the  AIDS & Crack era.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
We sit down w/ possibly one of our most polarizing guest ever, gentleman of leisure "Roadie Mack". "Roadie" give's us a sneak peak into the world of "The Game", We discuss how he has traveled the world with his "partners", how he has survived his occupation for 30 years, the economics of macking, the dangers of pimping vs macking and how he lost several friends in the  AIDS & Crack era.
